CustomField.formula: ( VALUE(TEXT(Technicality__c ))+ VALUE(TEXT(Storytelling_Sales_Focused__c ))+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c, 'NA' ), 0, VALUE(TEXT(Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c)) ) ) / (10+ IF( ISPICKVAL( Copywriter_Content_Engaging__c, 'NA' ), 0, 5 ) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Impacted By: Part 1 (Editor), Part 5 (Video Producer), & Part 6 (Senior Auditor)
CustomField.label: Copywriter Score
